name: XO Smash Blast and Pop Cubes
name_original: XO Smash Blast and Pop Cubes
description:
The challenging and interesting one-tap game that makes you addicting. XO Smash is the game that pushes the cubes of your speed and reaction.

The splendid 3D effects enable you to get exciting experience coming along with crosses and teleports.
Now, let’s get the control over the gameplay and defend the bottom line area from hungry cubed worms.

How to play:

Simply tap your finger on the squares of worms before they reach the bottom line of the screen earning the highest score possible. Lots of fun and action.

Try it now, play and have fun!!!
